title: Ukraine-Russia talks: negotiators gather in Abu Dhabi in wake of ‘massive’ strikes on Kyiv – Europe live
summary_full: Both sides downplay chances of immediate breakthrough in US-brokered talks as western allies reportedly weigh new defence pactRescuers are searching for possible missing people in the Aegean Sea after an overnight collision between a speedboat carrying migrants and a Greek coastguard vessel left at least 15 people dead.The bodies of 11 men and three women were recovered from the sea near the island of Chios shortly after the collision, Greek authorities said. One woman later died in hospital. Continue reading...
